channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for HI
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for HI

item.title: Report X-2024010695
item.description:
Report X-2024010695

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-30T15:10:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: AT THE UPS FACILITY IN HONOLULU, HAWAII, ONE PACKAGE BURST OPEN REVEALING SIX INNER BOXES MARKED AS GROUND LTD QTY. EACH INNER BOX MARKED AS LTD QTY CONTAINED 12 X 6 OZ CANS OF OARS + ALPS 100% MINERAL ANTIOXIDANT SUNSCREEN SPRAYS. THE SPRAYS ARE INDICATED TO BE IN NON-AEROSOL FORM. THE MANUFACTURER WEBSITE STATES THE PRODUCT CONTAINS COMPRESSED AIR AND ONLY SHIPS GROUND. UNABLE TO OBTAIN AN SDS. THE PACKAGE WAS SCANNED INTO AN AIR CONTAINER BUT WAS NOT FLOWN.

item.title: Report X-2024010363
item.description:
Report X-2024010363

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-26T15:11:09+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-12-13
  • City: HONOLULU
  • State: HI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: UN3161 metal cylinder in fibreboard overpack with gas/vapor release. secured in salvage drum pending further disposition. cylinder marking DOT 39 NRC 148/265 M1042 subs resubmit to PHMSA no answer to initial report
